scenario: In 2025, Alice has an Adjusted Gross Income (AGI) of $195,772.93. Alice makes a charitable contribution of $103,328.59 in cash to a public charity. Under I.R.C. § 170(b)(1), the deduction is limited to 50% of the contribution base.
question: Calculate the allowable charitable deduction for 2025.
answer_explanation: The deduction is limited to 50% of AGI ($97,886.46). Allowable: $97,886.46.
reasoning: Calculated limit and compared to contribution.
